channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lime bikes blocking the pavement outside Hyaat Hotel near the junction of Seymour street and Portman Sqaure, 12th July
item.description:
There are more than 20 lime bikes blocking pavement outside the Hyaat Hotel near the junction of Portman Square and Seymour Street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Portman Square, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins by Sainsburys are disgusting, 12th July
item.description:
These bins are creating a problem, not solving it. People throw litter on the floor instead of in bins. People also piss in the litter. The stench is disgusting, it looks gross and is a health hazard. Strongly suggest removing bins entirely.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Old Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal flyposting by www.uniquestyledrivesandpatios.co.uk on Austral Close, 12th July
item.description:
'Unique Style Drives and Patios' ( www.uniquestyledrivesandpatios.co.uk ) has mounted a poster ad on one of the posts on our street. We would like this to be removed please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Austral Close, Longlands, Sidcup, London

item.title: Street not swept - broken glass, 12th July
item.description:
There is a broken glass bottle on the grass that has been there for a week because the road has not been little picked or swept this past week. It’s dangerous for children and pets.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westhorne Avenue, Horn Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped bags of rubbish ripped open by foxes, 12th July
item.description:
Bags of rubbish dumped on either side of Jenkins Road leading to Ealdham Primary school - again. The bags have been ripped open by foxes and the rubbish is all over the road. This is happening once a month!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jeken Road, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: '20' zone street sign damaged and leaning dangerously, 12th July
item.description:
'20' zone street sign on Grove End Road about 75m from the junction with Wellington Road is damaged; the fixing in the ground is disturbed and loose, and the sign is leaning dangerously

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72-76, Grove End Road, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: U Entrance to Westminster college, 12th July
item.description:
Sorry there is was very bad smell today in morning around 10.00am I turn right i am going to tower hall the building and go Westminster college and it was very bad smell it was on the floor very dirty smell is killing everyone and me this smell is still in my head
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 349, Edgware Road, Paddington, London

item.title: Overflow bins and waste, 12th July
item.description:
This is the second time reporting this even though the website says ‘fixed.’ Please can you assist to take this fly tipped bin and furniture away from the street? It’s blocking the sidewalk.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brayards Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead pigeon, 12th July
item.description:
I found a dead pigeon right at the edge of our path where it meets the pavement. I have bagged it up and put the bag behind the bin, between the bin and the hedge.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Croydon Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water pipe leak, 12th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hillsboro Road, Dulwich Village, London
